cast.overview: The destinies of two families are irrevocably tied together after a cyclist is hit off the road by a jeep in the night before Christmas Eve.
cast.title: Human Capital

details.biography: Beatrice Gioli is an Italian actress and model, born on April 5, 1992, in Rome. She began her career in the fashion industry before receiving formal acting training at the Centro Sperimentale di Cinematografia in Rome. She made her film debut in 2013 with A un passo dal cielo, and gained wider recognition for her role as Sonia in Scusate se esisto! (2014), directed by Riccardo Milani. In 2015, she appeared in Alaska by Claudio Cupellini, followed by Il più grande sogno (2016) by Michele Vannucci. Her notable works also include La casa di famiglia (2017) and The Startup (2017). On television, she took part in series such as Medici (2018) and Curon (2020), released on Netflix.
details.name: Matilde Gioli
